title: 820-00850 no image, no touchbar image
message:
Hi guys,

nice to be here again, need to update myself to latest development and there is no other place for that.

I have a 820-00850 that switches to 20V only when the battery is connected. It will then draw 0.8-0.9A (possibly fully charged batt) and will give PPVCC_S0_CPU 1V. The fans spin and I get mouse light but no image internally, externally (if I disconnect the lvds) and no touchbar image.

F9000 is at 12.59V.
Board is clean from liquids. Customer said one day was working next day not.

Any pointers?

title: 820-00850 no image, no touchbar image
message: I will, silly question but can it be done with a pre-2016 macbook and USB-A to C?

title: 820-00850 no image, no touchbar image
message:
Yes, it can.
Be sure to get a good cable/adapter.

title: 820-00850 no image, no touchbar image
message:
Ok it starts and ends up with a padlock.

[ATTACH]59995[/ATTACH][ATTACH]59996[/ATTACH]

title: 820-00850 no image, no touchbar image
message: Did you try restore mode, with fresh install?

title: 820-00850 no image, no touchbar image
message: I think yes, I will try again today. In the meantime if you can think of something else please shoot!

title: 820-00850 no image, no touchbar image
message: I managed to flash it using Catalina, macbook pro 13" 2014 and RECOVERY mode.. works only on external maybe internal gpu is toast.

title: 820-00850 no image, no touchbar image
message:
So machine works good with external monitor?
On internal LCD, no image, or get image without backlight?
Did you try known good compatible LCD assembly?

title: 820-00850 no image, no touchbar image
message: there is no image I believe but I think you cant really verify this on these LCDs with a flash light right? BKLT voltage at 55V. And unfortunately no spare LCD as these are hard to get by even damaged ones.

title: 820-00850 no image, no touchbar image
message:
"BKLT voltage at 55V"
Open line to LEDs strip; possibly flex issue.
Check first if machine is still covered by Apple change screen program.

2016/17 LCD assembly can be used for test.
